component.name: Wallpaper Downloader
component.summary: Download, manage and change your wallpapers automatically from the Internet
Gestiona y descarga automáticamente fondos de pantalla desde Internet
Gerencia e baixa automaticamente papéis de parede da Internet

description.p: Wallpaper Downloader can automatically download and set wallpapers for you. Supported sites include: DeviantArt, Wallhaven, Bing Daily Wallpaper, Social Wallpapering, WallpaperFusion, DualMonitorBackgrounds.
